website_summaries.verdict: Only the fantastic retractable Smart Strap stands out on this otherwise conventional laptop case--but that one great feature is more than enough.
cons: not suitable for 17-inch laptops, despite its large size

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used this same briefcase for years. It’s his go to. The last one we ordered before Christmas the zipper frayed and came loose. It was replaced within 24 hours. The replacement is holding up with no problems. I gave this a 5 star as there can always be that one item that escapes quality control. We will order this again if available when he wears out this one. Note! He uses his briefcase and packs it full. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: What do I think?
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this product and so was the person I bought it for as a gift. It's too heavy without anything even in it. It was my fault not noticing the final return date, but Amazon agreed that they would take it back. Even though all packaging was intact, I had to pay a large sum to have Amazon take it back. I have learned my lesson to read more carefully about the weight of a product and the return expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: C. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I'm set in my ways so I've been using a similar bag for 15+ years. Finally broke down and got a new one (my 3rd of this style) and glad I did. So far the strap is retracting properly, which is eventually what went wrong with the last one. I hope to get at least 5 years out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: EDF

customer_reviews.title: The retractable shoulder strap is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great style for my Laptop and papers. I was replacing my (very) old case, of the same style, and couldn't find it, locally. The retractable shoulder strap is a Primary selling point. I will say I preferred the old style pockets, within the main compartment, as the velcro'ed floppy disc pockets aren't as secure as previously. But, other than than, a really good case. And, I think, the product was better than the offerings of the same price, that I found at Staples. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended - a top quality bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is EXACTLY what I wanted. Here's why: - The retractable handle is a phenomenal feature. No more hassles of the bag strap getting caught on door handles, etc. - The actual handles are great because when I don't have the bag loaded with 20 pounds of stuff, I can carry it like a traditional briefcase. - The two outer most pockets are legitimately accessible at all times when the bag is thrown over your shoulder. - Definitely does have the capability of carrying 20+ pounds of random stuff around. - The accordion style pocket on the near side is great for stashing papers and folders.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: No More Hard Back Briefcases!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband always liked the hard back briefcase, but after less than a years use, the back dislocated and my husband had to staple it back together. I decided it was time for my husband to try something different. I purchased the Solo Paramount Briefcase for him for Christmas and after a couple of weeks use,he said it was much better to use and handle. He liked it!
customer_reviews.author: Bama012156

customer_reviews.title: The retractable shoulder strap felt gimmicky to use
customer_reviews.text: The concept of a retractable shoulder strap sounded good in theory, but it just was so terrible to use in person. Build quality of the bag resembles poorly built Chinese made products. I ultimately settled on a Swiss gear laptop bag instead.
customer_reviews.author: Onion Rings

customer_reviews.title: Not built like the older model
customer_reviews.text: Had the earlier version and it lasted 5 years... This one? 9 months. Sides tearing out, strap pad losing seam... Just a piece of junk really.
customer_reviews.author: PJK-33

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Professional and Useful Bag What More Do You Need?
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bag. Looks highly professional, and for a busy man who uses this bag about every day of the week, it's quite durable. These are the same bags we bought about 5 years ago, but the price is far better. We really like the retractable strap and all those great compartments!
customer_reviews.author: HappyWife&Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great briefcase. Smart strap is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Love this briefcase. Replaced my Samsonite briefcase also with a “smart strap” that had fallen apart after a decade of daily use. This briefcase is lighter and useful with all the compartments. If it had a water bottle holder it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: GO

customer_reviews.title: Like it but have a question.
customer_reviews.text: I like it okay although it doesn't have as much room as I would like. The widest section has padded sides and a strap to hold down a laptop. The padding on each side is behind a zipper. There is no zipper pull that I can find. I'd like to pull the padding for a couple more inches of space since I find my padded laptop will fit fine in the back zippered compartment. What is this zipper here for if it's not openable? I don't get it. Anybody? Bueller?
customer_reviews.author: Pluto

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I take this bag literally everywhere with me. It carries a lot of the things I need when I'm going to be away from my main work area. I'm usually able to fit my laptop, tons of cabling, a few handheld game systems, pens, paper, etc without it feel at all heavy or cumbersome. The addition of the automatically retractable shoulder strap is an amazing feature and it makes me happy that when I just want to use the handles to quickly move the bag that I don't need to worry about tripping over the larger shoulder strap. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MattJL

customer_reviews.title: Quality Has Gone Down
customer_reviews.text: I travel extensively for my job and used a Solo briefcase similar to this model for three years. The overall quality was way better on my older bag. The material was thicker, the zippers were stronger, etc. The zippers on this new bag catch on excess material sometimes. I love the functionality and organization this bag has but I just wish the overall quality was better.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: I would like to remove the lining padding from the main compartment
customer_reviews.text: The strap on the back, which I use to load the briefcase onto my rolling work suitcase, was not wide enough. I slid it over the telescoping handle, and about an inch or two of stitching ripped along one side. The zippers catch occasionally. I would like to remove the lining padding from the main compartment, and though it has a zipper, I cannot open the zipper to access the interior lining/padding. Other than that, I do like the case - lots of good pockets. Pretty rugged so far (have had it about 2 months).
customer_reviews.author: Student Forever

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: There's not much you can say about a laptop bag but this is about as good as it gets for me. There are plenty of storage pockets for external drives, pens, paper files if desired and so on. Zippers are decent quality as well. The biggest thing to me is that when I set it down the strap neatly recoils and is not laying all over the place. It 100% met expectations and I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: ncballplayer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk didn't last a week. Seams busted quick. Sent back and got leather briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This holds a massive of things amount of things. Plenty of room for a 15.6" computer
customer_reviews.author: aviatorrie

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite laptop bag!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this laptop bag! Roomy and very well made. Will fit up to a 16 inch laptop with thick padding on all sides to hold it securely. The retractable strap works flawlessly and is definitely MUCH better than dealing with a regular shoulder strap! Also, this bag will hold a decent amount of weight without seeming like there is any stress on the retracting strap mechanism at all.
customer_reviews.author: I Can't Drive 55

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for, which is 2 months of a good bag.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for about 2 months, then the bag fails under where the strap lies. Fabric does not have hard plastic to keep it flat and instead collapses and looks cheap. The main compartment you'd most often to slip the laptop in has a small pouch on the closest side to the zipper, causing you to repeatedly shove the laptop into the small pouch instead of the main compartment. There is no velcro or other way to fasten the pouch and avoid this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love The Retractable Shoulder Strap!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag if you want something to safely transport a laptop and also carry all your office essentials. The retractable shoulder strap was the biggest differentiator among other bags. The quality is good for the price. Very happy with this case!
customer_reviews.author: LAS58

customer_reviews.title: Over 5 years use
customer_reviews.text: After 5 years of use from daily to office to airplane travel this case is awesome. After 5 years of use I need to replace since I have worn through the handle leather portion and have lost a couple of the pull tabs - held up to a lot of travel and a great value for the $$. I am ordering a second one and have a little concern of the comments about problems with the retractable smart strap - great feature and I hope my new bag will perform as well as the one I am retiring.
customer_reviews.author: Carl L. Schlemmer

customer_reviews.title: I like all the pockets and different storage compartments
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, I like all the pockets and different storage compartments. My only complaint was the "leather looking" handle not lasting very long on the first one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Music Man

customer_reviews.title: Great but bulky
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case, but it is bulky and somewhat heavy. I would say perfect for travel (providing you put it in overhead) but not so great for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Nordin

customer_reviews.title: Great Briefcase
customer_reviews.text: This briefcase replaced one exactly like it, that had worn out over 5 years. Luckily, this was at a lower price than I paid 5 years ago. Plenty of room for supplies, laptop, etc. I also use it as my carry-on bag on flights, and it's a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Love the strap
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few months and so far it seems very durable. Has plenty of room to hold everything I need to carry around and the retractable strap is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good improvements
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these retracting strap briefcases for 10 years. This is the first one that work every-time, retracting correctly without 'encouragement'. The zipper keys are a bit too long, I fear they will get caught and pulled off or broke... but a good overall briefcase
customer_reviews.author: Me Here

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I've been through many bags and this is my favorite. I didn't realize that it stands up like a briefcase when I set it down. That's a nice bonus. Had to deduct a star because it's kind of a pain not having a way to fasten the 2 handles together. Also the zipper on the compartment I use the most (second smallest) is sticky and I'm afraid it will get stuck at some point. No regrets with the purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Chad McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great briefcase!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this briefcase! It's light and easy to carry. He doesn't use it for a laptop but for papers. It has plenty of room in the large pocket and the smaller pockets up front. It seem well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: this is a really great bag. i love the retractable strap its great ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a really great bag. i love the retractable strap its great i have a dog and i don't have to worry about the strap tripping her. i have been useing it for a month and it has held up really well. i would recommend this to any young women or man looks very stylish and smart.
customer_reviews.author: Cassndra Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the shoulder and very well put together.
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! The cats also love it as a bed when the cover is left open.
customer_reviews.author: jessica tatro

customer_reviews.title: When time to replace I came back to this one - better than the old one
customer_reviews.text: Had my first for 6 years and traveled extensively with it. When time to replace I came back to this one - better than the old one. TONS of room - carry a laptop, a portable monitor, file folders and all the charging attachments with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Russ A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop Case
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I have purchased for not only myself but for co-workers. I love the retractable strap and with all the pockets and such it is easy to organize all my items for work. Definitely will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Don Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Great design but not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband at the beginning of September he absolutely loves the style and functionality. Sadly we’re two months in and it’s ripped along the seam. Really wish this great bag held up better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice briefcase
customer_reviews.text: Looks like good quality. Good storage amount, 1 big compartment, another large zippered area in the back, and a front pocket too. Strap works and contracts well. Nice looking bag. Time will tell, but it seems like it would hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel and a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, and plenty of room for files. The case stands up, which is convenient! The shoulder strap adjusts back into the case when not in use. Great for travelling! I highly recommend this lap top case.
customer_reviews.author: Dee W

customer_reviews.title: SOLO 16 laptop case
customer_reviews.text: Best briefcase I have had. Great for air personal bag- holds computer (or two) plus papers etc. Just the right size, and I really like the fold away strap.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great briefcase, although a bit heavy by itself
customer_reviews.text: Great briefcase, although a bit heavy by itself. Not to mention, the back pocket isn't as big as I had hoped. Still, fits everything I need, and more.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio Tampe

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice But A Little Big
customer_reviews.text: This item is great! I love the various compartments and the retractable strap but it is a little bigger than I expected. I would say that it could fit a 17" computer but the protection seems to be sufficient for a smaller computer (mine is a 15.6"). All in all, I am happy with this case.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great seller! Just what I needed. As close to the bag I was trying replace plus more. Not that in love with the retractable strap but not a deal-breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: ReeTeeG

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these bags I have owned. The first was the smaller version but still had the same issue with the strap not retracting well and eventually not at all. It is a functional bag, however. If you are just looking for a durable, day to day work bag this will do fine. If you travel alot as I do, you may want to look at something a little more TSA friendly. There are some great design aspects that could be improved on by combining them with some of the other TSA approved designs. The combination would be the perfect functional business travel case.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Carter

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Clever product, well-balanced and stands up on its own regardless of its contents, and the strap is amazing. Best briefcase I've ever had
customer_reviews.author: Andy H.

customer_reviews.title: Smells Horribe
customer_reviews.text: Had this model for years. This one is definitely cheaper made. My main problem is that is smells HORRIBLE. It actually gives me a headache. I don't know if they are all like this or maybe I got a bad one. It is almost unusable
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Reams

customer_reviews.title: Need to get a replacement
customer_reviews.text: We need to return the case. It is breaking apart. Please send a replacement
customer_reviews.author: david a chelstowski

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Sturdy, well constructed, several compartments, and I LOVE the retractable strap. I get compliments on it and the strap regularly. Best part is I expensed it for work.
customer_reviews.author: MDub

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderfully lazy buy. Self-standing, retracting strap make my coming-and-going at work so much less stressful.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This portfolio was delivered as promised and is exactly how it was described. It is what my husband wanted and seems to be a very good quality with lots of compartments and spacious interior. We are very pleased with the portfolio and with the way the seller handled our delivery. The seller was away when the order was placed but expedited the order as soon as he was able.
customer_reviews.author: DianeO

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: One of my kids uses this as his book bag in high school. He loves the retractable strap. It holds up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dio_K

customer_reviews.title: Nice retractable strap
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I like it very much. Nice retractable strap
customer_reviews.author: Andy Kolar

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Love the retractable strap
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Love the retractable strap. I use it for work on a daily basis so when I place it down the strap goes back and I could use the other side handles as well. Only thing that they could work on is if the strap came with more comfortable padding
customer_reviews.author: Jose Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality. holds a large amount of product. I specifically use it to carry large binders and packets. very good features and professional looking. great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smart Strap
customer_reviews.text: Love the smart strap. Don't have to worry about hooking strap as I'm walking down the aisle on the plane. Firts everything I need. This is my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Gayla H.

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. Way too big as a daily laptop bag. Probably wouldn't fit under an airplane seat.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Maira

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, the strap is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room in the bag, enough for my laptop, ipad, documents, accessories, and some other stuff. It looks nice and is good to take on business trips.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bodal

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. This briefcase came apart at the seam within 2 weeks of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M.

customer_reviews.title: He says it is very comfortable. He loves the retractable strap)
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband. He says it is very comfortable. He loves the retractable strap)
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty durable lasted for 3 years for an every week traveler.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dicken

customer_reviews.title: This bag has held up great. The retracting strap is amazing option
customer_reviews.text: Been using this bag for 8 months now. This bag has held up great. The retracting strap is amazing option.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Frazao

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the $
customer_reviews.text: I really like the retractable strap. Holds a ton including computer, planner, files. Downside-it would be nice if it had a side pocket to carry a water bottle and the zippers sometimes stick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: broken strap after 1 day!
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great laptop case if the strap hadn't broken one day after receiving it. I read reviews where people had indicated this problem happening to them, but decided to take a chance and go for it anyways. I regret that decision and now am returning the bag for something better.
customer_reviews.author: tbrown987

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: It has suited my every need. It fits a 15" laptop with ease and has plenty of room for all of my work documents. Unlike other similar products I've looked at this one has plenty of pockets and storage for all of my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Z's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the material but was a bit larger then expected
customer_reviews.author: Ebj323

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brief case on 09-18-12 to carry my Lenovo Laptop and my ipad. After two weeks the smart strap doesn't work so it has been hanging since then. I reached out to the seller but never got a response, so shame on me for buying this. Most of the negative ratings were for the smart strap, that isn't has smart as one would think. The bag is still useful as a normal brief case, however I bought it for the smart, now not so smart, strap.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin S. Elam

customer_reviews.title: Less Well Made than 5 yr ago
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper made than version I got 5 yr ago - zipper pulls will break easily, thin low grade. No zippered pocket inside now. Reduced pockets structure inside. Hard to find other smart straps though.
customer_reviews.author: the riddler

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: The case is strong, easily fits 2 laptops and can fit 3 too. Retracting straps are a big plus to convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Saharsh S.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok when it works
customer_reviews.text: This is a great briefcase in theory. I have had one other one that worked perfectly. This time the retractable strap didn't work from the beginning. I still am using it. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tillie

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop bag I've bought so far
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room. Best laptop bag I've bought so far...and I've been through many.
customer_reviews.author: F. Samson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Smart Strap Bag
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag even tho it is too heavy with what I carry in it to use the shoulder strap. Nice Compartments. Seems well made but have only had it a month.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Renee Cantway

customer_reviews.title: The strap is nicely made and retracts consistently
customer_reviews.text: Roomy and spacious, able to hold all of my items with room to spare. The strap is nicely made and retracts consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a year and the stitching is coming out. Not happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Greninger

customer_reviews.title: Good computer case
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem finding a good computer bag - read an excellent review of this on on CNET and purchased online. It gives good protection to the laptop and the retractable strap is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Def

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in June and it has worked great! I usually fly Southwest and it fits under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: P. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant by the reviews that said the strap breaks easily but so far so good with mine! I love the organization it provides, its not to big or cumbersome but yet it holds everything I need it to very nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had the same Bag that lasted years until Recently. So I relaced it with the same Bag!!!😊
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This bag replaced another solo bag that l had for many year. It was the same design as this one and held up very well. The retractable strap still works the same as the day I bought it. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Cottman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was actually a gift for my father, and he absolutely loved it. His favorite part was the strap b/c you can hide it or pull it out when needed.
customer_reviews.author: andrea bolivar

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bag to carry my laptop securely, clamshell style. Something that would also hold a few files. This more than does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Akyeampong

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I looked for several days online and in local stores to find a medium-sized laptop portfolio that had additional storage for a reasonable price and this product fit the bill. I was not disappointed when it arrived. It is exactly what I was looking for and it didn't cost $80 - $200 like most similar to it.
customer_reviews.author: geeman60

customer_reviews.title: The case has been fine for over 2 months now
customer_reviews.text: The case has been fine for over 2 months now. Some of the zippers have been getting slightly stuck though
customer_reviews.author: kegler4ever

customer_reviews.title: great bag except smartstrap broke, twice
customer_reviews.text: I like all features of bag and really wanted the smartstrap as I had one from USluggage with retractable strap that served me for 5ish years. However, smartstrap would not retract on one side after about 7-10days of use. I returned for another, thinking that it might be an anomaly, but 2nd one broke in exactly same way after about 1 week. I will return and get another bag. I saw another review with exactly same story. I dont see many bags with this retractable strap, maybe they are difficult to make reliable.
customer_reviews.author: RexT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Still have it till this day ordered years ago. Note its on the larger side.
customer_reviews.author: baby blue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love it, big enough for all my things, good quality , nice and resistant
customer_reviews.author: Thor Erickson

customer_reviews.title: The Solo product did not meet my expectations. The strap does not work as marketed.
customer_reviews.text: The retractable strap does not retract. I am returning my second briefcase becasue of this problem. I thought the strap was a patented design?
customer_reviews.author: Curt Baskin

customer_reviews.title: I travel a lot and was looking for something like this bag
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and was looking for something like this bag. It looks great. Feels great. It is a bit big so fitting it under the seat in front of you and trying to fit your feet between it can get challenging. Overall awesome bag. I wouldn’t hesitate to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: solo bag
customer_reviews.text: great bag use for my business lots of room for files and laptop saved over $30.00 over Staples same product Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: bigred391

customer_reviews.title: A good buy :-)
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a brief case man since college. It was time to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: mike mccurtain

product_meta.title: Solo Paramount 16 Inch Laptop Briefcase with Smart Strap, Black
product_meta.description:
Solo 16” Laptop Smart Strap Briefcase features Smart Strap shoulder strap that automatically retracts into the case frame, a padded compartment that protects laptops up to 16”, front zippered pocket, zip down organizer section and file pocket, padded carry handles and Rear Ride Along feature for consolidated travel all of which make your work life more manageable on the go! Comes with 5 year warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

You seek timeless design and proven organization. Rely on SOLO Classic. Rugged enough for constant use, intelligent enough for fast, easy access. You’re a pro. The SOLO Classic Collection Laptop Portfolio features a padded laptop pocket which holds most 16 inch laptops, while the Ride Along strap allows this bag to slip over a telescoping handle system for consolidated travel. A front compartment zips down and features an organizer with an accordion fan file, business credit card slots, and pen loops to help keep items neat and easy to find. The Smart Strap shoulder strap automatically retracts into the case frame when not in use. SOLO bags offer new freedom to create your own work space, any time and any place. Get the satisfaction, comfort and confidence that come with knowing that you’ve found the “perfect bag” for you.
feature_bullets: Fully padded laptop compartment fits most MacBooks and laptops up to 15.6 Inches
Front zippered pocket, zip down organizer section and file pocket
13 Inches H x 18 Inches L x 5.75 Inches W
Smart Strap shoulder strap automatically retracts into case frame
Rear Ride Along feature for consolidated travel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars150 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
